rationales.description: The AR exceptions total of $2,586,167.48 significantly exceeds the $50,000 materiality limit, indicating a high risk to financial accuracy.
rationales.recommended_action: Conduct a detailed review of AR transactions to identify and correct discrepancies.

rationales.description: AP exceptions totaling $653,977.70 suggest potential control failures in accounts payable processes.
rationales.recommended_action: Implement enhanced controls and perform a thorough audit of AP transactions to ensure compliance.

rationales.description: Bank duplicates identified in 13 instances could lead to inaccurate financial reporting.
rationales.recommended_action: Reconcile bank statements and eliminate duplicate entries to ensure data accuracy.

rationales.description: Flux exceptions totaling 47 instances indicate potential non-compliance with regulatory reporting standards.
rationales.recommended_action: Review and adjust financial flux analysis to align with compliance standards.
